actions.name: AddTagsToOnPremisesInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to one or more on-premises instances

actions.name: BatchGetApplicationRevisions
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about one or more application revisions

actions.name: BatchGetApplications
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about multiple applications associated with the IAM user

actions.name: BatchGetDeploymentGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about one or more deployment groups

actions.name: BatchGetDeploymentInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about one or more instance that are part of a deployment group

actions.name: BatchGetDeploymentTargets
actions.description: Grants permission to return an array of one or more targets associated with a deployment. This method works with all compute types and should be used instead of the deprecated BatchGetDeploymentInstances. The maximum number of targets that can be returned is 25

actions.name: BatchGetDeployments
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about multiple deployments associated with the IAM user

actions.name: BatchGetOnPremisesInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about one or more on-premises instances

actions.name: ContinueDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to start the process of rerouting traffic from instances in the original environment to instances in thereplacement environment without waiting for a specified wait time to elapse

actions.name: CreateApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to create an application associated with the IAM user

actions.name: CreateCloudFormationDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to create CloudFormation deployment to cooperate ochestration for a CloudFormation stack update

actions.name: CreateDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to create a deployment for an application associated with the IAM user

actions.name: CreateDeploymentConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to create a custom deployment configuration associated with the IAM user

actions.name: CreateDeploymentGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a deployment group for an application associated with the IAM user

actions.name: DeleteApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an application associated with the IAM user

actions.name: DeleteDeploymentConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a custom deployment configuration associated with the IAM user

actions.name: DeleteDeploymentGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a deployment group for an application associated with the IAM user

actions.name: DeleteGitHubAccountToken
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a GitHub account connection

actions.name: DeleteResourcesByExternalId
actions.description: Grants permission to delete resources associated with the given external Id

actions.name: DeregisterOnPremisesInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister an on-premises instance

actions.name: GetApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a single application associated with the IAM user

actions.name: GetApplicationRevision
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a single application revision for an application associated with the IAM user

actions.name: GetDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a single deployment to a deployment group for an application associated with the IAM user

actions.name: GetDeploymentConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a single deployment configuration associated with the IAM user

actions.name: GetDeploymentGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a single deployment group for an application associated with the IAM user

actions.name: GetDeploymentInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a single instance in a deployment associated with the IAM user

actions.name: GetDeploymentTarget
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about a deployment target

actions.name: GetOnPremisesInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a single on-premises instance

actions.name: ListApplicationRevisions
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all application revisions for an application associated with the IAM user

actions.name: ListApplications
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all applications associated with the IAM user

actions.name: ListDeploymentConfigs
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all deployment configurations associated with the IAM user

actions.name: ListDeploymentGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all deployment groups for an application associated with the IAM user

actions.name: ListDeploymentInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all instances in a deployment associated with the IAM user

actions.name: ListDeploymentTargets
actions.description: Grants permission to return an array of target IDs that are associated a deployment

actions.name: ListDeployments
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all deployments to a deployment group associated with the IAM user, or to get all deployments associated with the IAM user

actions.name: ListGitHubAccountTokenNames
actions.description: Grants permission to list the names of stored connections to GitHub accounts

actions.name: ListOnPremisesInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of one or more on-premises instance names

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of tags for the resource identified by a specified ARN. Tags are used to organize and categorize your CodeDeploy resources

actions.name: PutLifecycleEventHookExecutionStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to notify a lifecycle event hook execution status for associated deployment with the IAM user

actions.name: RegisterApplicationRevision
actions.description: Grants permission to register information about an application revision for an application associated with the IAM user

actions.name: RegisterOnPremisesInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to register an on-premises instance

actions.name: RemoveTagsFromOnPremisesInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from one or more on-premises instances

actions.name: SkipWaitTimeForInstanceTermination
actions.description: Grants permission to override any specified wait time and starts terminating instances immediately after the traffic routing is complete. This action applies to blue-green deployments only

actions.name: StopDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a deployment

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to associate the list of tags in the input Tags parameter with the resource identified by the ResourceArn input parameter

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a resource from a list of tags. The resource is identified by the ResourceArn input parameter. The tags are identfied by the list of keys in the TagKeys input parameter

actions.name: UpdateApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to update an application

actions.name: UpdateDeploymentGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to change information about a single deployment group for an application associated with the IAM user
